snippet.title: Ecuador: Where to Stay in Zamora, zamora chinchipe, new englander
snippet.description:
Ecuador: Where to Stay in Zamora, zamora chinchipe, new englander
Nov 10, 2012 ... My family (wife and 2 children 10 & 11) are planning a trip to Vilcabamba for 2 weeks in June 2013. ... We plan to fly into Guayaquil for one night, then catch the plane to ... I would describe Zamora as the "gateway" to the rain forest. ... is in early June) & ...
http://en.allexperts.com/q/Ecuador-131/2012/10/stay-zamora.htm
